name: endocrine gland cancer
definition: An organ system cancer located_in endocrine system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation of the hormone producing glands of the endocrine system. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Endocrine_system]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, gene replacement therapy of MEN1 into pituitary tumors reduced tumor cell proliferation in a mouse model of Multiple endocrine neoplasia type 1, a disorder causing multiple endocrine tumors resulting from MEN1 loss of function mutations (PMID: 22915754).

references.title: MEN1 gene replacement therapy reduces proliferation rates in a mouse model of pituitary adenomas.
